content: this crochet egg pattern includes the method for crocheting eggs 2 different ways whole and fried you ll receive a downloadable 7-page pdf pattern with detailed instructions and lots of clear pictures to help you along the way i am always available to help and answer questions as well the crochet pattern is written in us terms and will be available by download immediately after purchase the whole egg will end up being about 2 5 | the fried egg will end up being about 3 5 materials you will need - dk/light worsted weight & aran weight yarn / 100% organic cotton - 3 00 mm crochet hook - stuffing - tapestry needle - scissors - stitch markers abbreviations used in the pattern chain chain st stitch hk hook slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet flo front loop only increase increase 2 single crochets in one stitch decrease decrease 2 stitches together x repeat instructions indicated number of times total number of stitches in round
